----- Original Message -----
From: "Berend de Boer" <berend@...>
>
> Best would be probably a hidden field, name "method" or so that really
> indicates what you wanted. You need to have it for PUT/DELETE anyway.
Not for pure-automation approaches where you go beyond a classic web
browser.

It's not harmful to retrieve via POST, just not optimal. But it is harmful
to modify via GET. So the method names are not merely ideology.
